headline: lululemon athletica (NasdaqGS:LULU) Sees 17% Stock Decline Over One Week Despite Strong Earnings
summary: Lululemon Athletica (NasdaqGS:LULU) recently announced strong Q4 and full-year earnings, with sales growth of 13% and 10% respectively, complemented by an active share buyback program. Despite these positive financial results, the company's stock fell 17% over the past week. This significant decline occurred amid broader market volatility, with major indexes like the S&P 500 experiencing turbulent trading as investors awaited the impact of potential U.S. tariff announcements by President...

headline: Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU) on Substack by Northwest Frontier Capital. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on LULU. Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU)’s share was trading at $279.63 as of April 1st. LULU’s trailing and forward P/E were 19.10 and 18.02 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Lululemon’s recent […]

headline: Lululemon Stock Sinks on Outlook, but Is It Time to Buy the Dip?
summary: 2024 was not a good year for apparel specialist Lululemon Athletica (NASDAQ: LULU) investors, and 2025 is not off to a good start.  The stock price fell around 25% in 2024 and is trading down more than 26% to start this year following the company's most recent earnings report and guidance release.  Investors have been worried about changing fashion trends and Lululemon's growth after some earlier missteps, including the disappointing summer 2024 launch of its Breezethrough leggings, which were aimed at hot-yoga enthusiasts.
